pdfTitle.en: Test report for extraction and filtration systems

text.en: In case the contact is not to be found above, please enter it manually below:
text.de: Falls der Kontakt oben nicht auffindbar ist, bitte folgend manuell eintippen:

text.en: If different from the customer, please fill in the following data on the operation location:
text.de: Falls abweichend vom Kunde, bitte folgende Daten zum Einsatzort ausfüllen:

text.en: Tel. no. of contact person (operation location)
Differential pressure [in Pa] before filter change
Flow velocity [in m/s] before filter change
Differential pressure [in Pa] after filter change
Flow velocity [in m/s] after filter change
Results of the second measurement (if necessary):
Differential pressure [in Pa] before filter change
Flow velocity [in m/s] before filter change
Differential pressure [in Pa] after filter change
Flow velocity [in m/s] after filter change
Results of the third measurement (if necessary):
Differential pressure [in Pa] before filter change
Flow velocity [in m/s] before filter change
Differential pressure [in Pa] after filter change
Flow velocity [in m/s] after filter change
Inspection carried out in accordance with DGUV-V3

subject.en: ULT – Test report for extraction and filtration systems
subject.de: ULT – Prüfbericht für Absaug- und Filteranlagen

body.en:
This e-mail was generated automatically.
Please do not reply to this e-mail.

Dear Sir or Madam,

In the attachment you will find the completed test report as a PDF.

Best regards,
Your Field Service Team
body.de:
Diese E-Mail wurde automatisch generiert.
Bitte antworten Sie nicht auf diese E-Mail.

Sehr geehrte Damen und Herren,

Im Anhang finden Sie den abgeschlossenen Prüfbericht als PDF.

Mit freundlichen Grüßen,
Ihr Service-Außendienst
